name: Miyako: Awayuki no Utage
summary: A fandisc for the original MIYAKO game. Izumi holds a party for the shigoryou and shocks everyone by saying he’s disbanding their group. He also trusts Sangou with the mission of collecting magical shells to become a better shikigami.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: [PSP] 雅恋 ～MIYAKO～ あわゆきのうたげ PV
